section.title: NAME
section.simpara: odgi_view - projection of graphs into other formats

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.simpara: The odgi view(1) command can convert a graph in odgi format to GFAv1. It can reveal a graph’s internal structures for e.g. debugging processes.

listitem.simpara: File containing the succinct variation graph to convert from. The file name usually ends with .og.
Write the graph in GFAv1 format to standard output.

Show the internal structures of a graph. Print to stdout the maximum node identifier, the minimum node identifier, the nodes vector, the delete nodes bit vector and the path metadata, each in a separate line.
Print a help message for odgi view.
Failure (syntax or usage error; parameter error; file processing failure; unexpected error).
